alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 11:00AM EDT until August 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg affecting Floyd County. The next statement will be issued by 5 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Levisa Fork at Prestonsburg. * WHEN...From this morning to early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 31.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 22.6 feet Saturday morning. It will rise to 24.3 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Action stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. &&
